unnormalised: As per Section 80C, one can claim a deduction of up to Rs. 1.5 lakh. Please ensure all tax filings are completed before 31/07/2024 to avoid penalties.
normalised: As per Section eighty C, one can claim a deduction of up to rupee one point five lakh. Please ensure all tax filings are completed before thirty first july two thousand and twenty four to avoid penalties.
